name: Anchor (Text Link)
description: The Anchor, also known as "Link" is used to navigate from one page to the next HTML page.

props.name: element
props.doc: Define what HTML or React element should be used (e.g. `element={Link}`). Defaults to semantic `a` element.

props.name: to
props.doc: Use this prop only if you are using a router Link component as the `element` that uses the `to` property to declare the navigation url.

props.name: target
props.doc: Defines the opening method. Use `_blank` to open a new browser window/tab.

props.name: targetBlankTitle
props.doc: The title shown as a tooltip when target is set to `_blank`.

props.name: tooltip
props.doc: Provide a string or a React Element to be shown as the tooltip content.

props.name: icon
props.doc: [Primary Icons](/icons/primary) can be set as a string (e.g. icon="chevron_right"), other icons should be set as React elements.

props.name: iconPosition
props.doc: `left` (default) or `right`. Places icon to the left or to the right of the text.

props.name: noAnimation
props.doc: Removes animations if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: noHover
props.doc: Removes hover effects if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: noStyle
props.doc: Removes styling if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: noUnderline
props.doc: Removes underline if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: noIcon
props.doc: Removes icons if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: noLaunchIcon
props.doc: Removes launch icon if set to `true`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.
